verses.verse: In the tenth <S%H6224><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>, in the tenth <S%H6224><s%> month <S%H8147><s%>, in the twelfth day of the month <S%H2320><s%>, the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, set <S%H7760><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> against Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against him <S%H4714><s%>, and against all Egypt;

speak <S%H1696><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: Behold <S%H6547><s%>, I am against thee, Pharaoh king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, the great <S%H1419><s%> monster <S%H8577><s%> that lieth <S%H7257><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of his rivers <S%H2975><s%>, that hath said <S%H559><s%>, My river <S%H2975><s%> is mine own <S%H6213><s%>, and I have made it for myself.

And I will put <S%H5414><s%> hooks <S%H2397><s%> in thy jaws <S%H3895><s%>, and I will cause the fish <S%H1710><s%> of thy rivers <S%H2975><s%> to stick <S%H1692><s%> unto thy scales <S%H7193><s%>; and I will bring thee up <S%H5927><s%> out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of thy rivers <S%H2975><s%>, with all the fish <S%H1710><s%> of thy rivers <S%H2975><s%> which stick <S%H1692><s%> unto thy scales <S%H7193><s%>.

And I will cast <S%H5203><s%> thee forth into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, thee and all the fish <S%H1710><s%> of thy rivers <S%H2975><s%>: thou shalt fall <S%H5307><s%> upon the open <S%H6440><s%> field <S%H7704><s%>; thou shalt not be brought together <S%H622><s%>, nor gathered <S%H6908><s%>; I have given <S%H5414><s%> thee for food <S%H402><s%> to the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> and to the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the heavens <S%H8064><s%>.

And all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, because they have been a staff <S%H4938><s%> of reed <S%H7070><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

When they took hold <S%H8610><s%> of thee by thy hand <S%H3709><s%>, thou didst break <S%H7533><s%>, and didst rend <S%H1234><s%> all their shoulders <S%H3802><s%>; and when they leaned <S%H8172><s%> upon thee <S%H7665><s%>, thou brakest, and madest all their loins <S%H4975><s%> to be at a stand <S%H5976><s%>.

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: Behold <S%H935><s%>, I will bring a sword <S%H2719><s%> upon thee <S%H3772><s%>, and will cut off from thee man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%>.

And the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> shall be a desolation <S%H8077><s%> and a waste <S%H2723><s%>; and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>. Because he hath said <S%H559><s%>, The river <S%H2975><s%> is mine <S%H6213><s%>, and I have made it;

therefore <S%H2975><s%>, behold, I am against thee, and against thy rivers, and I will make <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> an utter <S%H2721><s%> waste <S%H2723><s%> and desolation <S%H8077><s%>, from the tower <S%H4024><s%> of Seveneh <S%H5482><s%> even unto the border <S%H1366><s%> of Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%>.

No foot <S%H7272><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> shall pass through <S%H5674><s%> it <S%H7272><s%>, nor foot of beast <S%H929><s%> shall pass through <S%H5674><s%> it <S%H3427><s%>, neither shall it be inhabited forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.

And I will make <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> a desolation <S%H8077><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the countries <S%H776><s%> that are desolate <S%H8074><s%>; and her cities <S%H5892><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> that are laid waste <S%H2717><s%> shall be a desolation <S%H8077><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>; and I will scatter <S%H6327><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and will disperse <S%H2219><s%> them through the countries <S%H776><s%>.

For thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: At the end <S%H7093><s%> of forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> will I gather <S%H6908><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> from the peoples <S%H5971><s%> whither they were scattered <S%H6327><s%>;

and I will bring back <S%H7725><s%> the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and will cause them to return <S%H7725><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Pathros <S%H6624><s%>, into the land <S%H776><s%> of their birth <S%H4351><s%>; and they shall be there a base <S%H8217><s%> kingdom <S%H4467><s%>.

It shall be the basest <S%H8217><s%> of the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%>; neither shall it any more lift itself up above <S%H5375><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%>: and I will diminish <S%H4591><s%> them <S%H7287><s%>, that they shall no more rule over the nations <S%H1471><s%>.

And it shall be no more the confidence <S%H4009><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, bringing <S%H2142><s%> iniquity <S%H5771><s%> to remembrance <S%H2142><s%>, when they turn to look <S%H6437><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them <S%H3045><s%>: and they shall know that I am the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.

And it came to pass in the seven <S%H7651><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>, in the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H259><s%>, in the first day of the month <S%H2320><s%>, the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, Nebuchadrezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> caused <S%H5647><s%> his army <S%H2428><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> service <S%H5656><s%> against Tyre <S%H6865><s%>: every head <S%H7218><s%> was made bald <S%H7139><s%>, and every shoulder <S%H3802><s%> was worn <S%H4803><s%>; yet had he no wages <S%H7939><s%>, nor his army <S%H2428><s%>, from Tyre <S%H6865><s%>, for the service <S%H5656><s%> that he had served against it <S%H5647><s%>.

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>: Behold <S%H5414><s%>, I will give the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> unto Nebuchadrezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>; and he shall carry <S%H5375><s%> off her multitude <S%H1995><s%>, and take <S%H5375><s%> her spoil <S%H7998><s%>, and take <S%H7997><s%> her prey <S%H957><s%>; and it shall be the wages <S%H7939><s%> for his army <S%H2428><s%>.

I have given <S%H5414><s%> him the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> as his recompense <S%H6468><s%> for which he served <S%H5647><s%>, because they wrought <S%H6213><s%> for me <S%H5002><s%>, saith the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.

In that day <S%H3117><s%> will I cause <S%H6779><s%> a horn <S%H7161><s%> to bud forth <S%H6779><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and I will give <S%H5414><s%> thee the opening <S%H6610><s%> of the mouth <S%H6310><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of them <S%H3045><s%>; and they shall know that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
